document.full_text: hundreds of young shi'ite men marched down a commercial street in the saudi city of qatif, near the heart of the kingdom's oil industry, pounding their fists in anger over their country's military intervention in bahrain.
document.title: saudi shi'ite protests simmer as bahrain conflict rages
lines_and_colors: hundreds of young shi'ite men marched down a commercial street in the saudi city of qatif, near the heart of the kingdom's oil industry, pounding their fists in anger over their country's military intervention in bahrain.
